topic.title: The Anonymous ZeroMe Hub
topic.body:
A ZeroMe hub for Anonymous-users: [Anonymous Hub](/1H51ZJ118ubwYAceszZ6CRMp4MPaSwcMh1).
This hub accept and spread messages from users of @0ch.anonymous and @ifs.anonymous. :-)
Thanks for your seeding and using! :D

topic.title: Which will be firstly taked down by GFW: Lantern or ZeroNet?
The userscript to warn clearnet links
topic.body:
Add a red outline on clearnet links.
Don't too depend on this, evil pages still can bypass this test.

https://github.com/zcyzcy88/SelfColle/blob/master/clearnet.user.js

1_12BA8CeJuG7FZYs7EpGg2rTs3pxkdRNZrV.body:
> [n0luck](#comment_1_18GgFj4zdkyx9F3XsHnTXQiQ8krKYxe6no): Is this system technically legal in China? Since you guys are technically cheating the system.
Is your country delete all the messages is bad to your government ?

> [n0luck](#comment_1_18GgFj4zdkyx9F3XsHnTXQiQ8krKYxe6no): Is this system technically legal in China? Since you guys are technically cheating the system.

Is your Gov don't let they citizens use google twitter facebook yoitube and so on freedom server ? if you say no, you can not understand why chinese like decentribute network.

> [eddfb](#comment_1_17nywXhRcDFHeGQ31fkZrhyKoZFG97BjDC): I'm a Chinese and I know ZeroNet form a microbilog user named "你的档案“. Because the Great Firewall,ZeroNet can be usefull.

I think you will let "你的档案“ get some truble, his weibo will be delete at no long future. 你这样会让他的微博很快被封的......

3_1ArDm9BfJUTfrGQLDra6KKNYYqXWS7v2sp.body: zeronet是一个网络基础的工具，官方的网站全都是nofish自个儿整出来的，毕竟他个人时间精力有限，他做出这几个网站只是想把zeronet的功能展示出来而已，要做到实用，还是需要爱好者参与的。

2_1JKrpj4ZrupPN1ipD1Bhto6edqZS8HyKaD.body: 从此没有404的烦恼，从此不会再有“根据相关法律法规，该内容不以显示。”的温馨提醒。裸奔不安全，戴套的安全性够你用。

57_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv.body: 看到你们这几个傻逼在这里自娱自乐，很搞笑。

> [gdd](#comment_12_1LESBhM9ResjKhCCNhgbNDVFKcfdQractA): 你说我没搞清楚，那么请已经搞清楚的你给大家说说ZeroID的作用是啥。快说吧，我们在这里看着呢

傻逼，ZeroID只是用在这里跟你撇撇逼而已的，会搞的人都可以搞一个什么鬼 SBID，chishiID，TMDid都行，建网站跟你的id没半毛钱关系。帐号系统人人都可以搞一套出来，只要让网站认就行了。参考kaffieID，0chan.bit

2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body:
> [guans](#comment_16_14LGKhv21es4drCF2mL7gDWSb13S3wmaeQ): Also Liu Xiao Bo case. This world has 3 super power country. That is US with Capitalism system. Name 2 other superpower country with Democracy system...Nope, China and Russian isn't using Democratic system. Too much hassle when 1 decision is taking whole weeks maybe months by parliament vote. Your country already done by other country spy. [...]

You keep mentioning "our country" but which exact country is yours? It's fine if you want to role-play as a foreigner, but at least improve your English so that it doesn't suck enough to betray your identity as an underpaid govt shill. Also there is only one "superpower": the US. The USSR was one before it fell, and China never was one. Now quit the shitposting and get lost.
